name: repository_stars
description: Tracks the number of stars of a github repository has received over time, including details about who starred the repository and when.

dimensions.name: starred_at
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the repository was starred. If the questions is for a value over time without specifying time granularity, return daily values

dimensions.name: user__login
dimensions.description: The login of the user who gave the star to this repository.

measures.name: total_stars
measures.description: The total number of stars the repository has received.

sample_questions: How many stars does the repo have?
Show the number of stars per week for the repository Yonom/assistant-ui.
Who gave the first star and last star?
